author: Special Correspondent
text:
A youth has been sentenced to life imprisonment for murdering a 59-year-old woman and stealing her jewellery.

Police said that Sankar Kumar (36) of Poolankudiyiruppu near Shencottai hacked to death V. Shanmugathai of Puliyarai on February 12, 2011 when she was alone in her home, and took away her 4.5-sovereign gold chain. When a neighbour, Petchimuthu, tried to save Shanmugathai, he was also attacked by Sankar Kumar. Puliyarai police registered case and arrested Sankar Kumar.

First Additional Sessions Court Judge Muthukrishnan sentenced Sankar Kumar to life imprisonment and also imposed a fine of Rs. 2,500 on him.
title: Man gets life term for murder
